name: Clothing Shop
description: A shop selling ready-made garments and fabrics; adventurers can purchase disguises, buy fashionable attire, or commission custom clothing.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the soft scent of fine fabrics and the subtle aroma of new clothing. The sound of fabric being measured and cut creates a gentle, methodical rhythm. Racks of colorful garments and bolts of fabric create a vibrant display, while the air carries the promise of style and transformation.
